item.title: Do Eye Floaters Mean Something Is Wrong?
item.description:
You’re going about your day when suddenly — there it is. A speck. A shadow. A squiggly line drifting across your vision. You blink. It stays. You start to wonder:
Do eye floaters mean something is wrong?

If that question brought you here, you’re not alone. Millions of people ask it every year — usually after noticing a new floater and spiraling into health anxiety. Let’s break down what’s actually going on, when to be concerned, and how to move forward with clarity.
